author: Alexander Stoklosa
title: 2017 Volvo V60 Polestar Tested: The 362-hp Invisibility Cloak!
text:
-There could not exist a greater chasm between the first impression given by the name Polestar and the Volvo V60 variant that wears it. This unassuming Volvo hatchback is such an introvert, it might suffer from social anxiety. READ MORE ›› 
-
